original_text:
Then shall the young women rejoice in the dance,
    and the young men and the old shall be merry.
I will turn their mourning into joy;
    I will comfort them, and give them gladness for sorrow.
korean_text: 그 때에 처녀는 춤추며 즐거워하겠고 청년과 노인은 함께 즐거워하리니 내가 그들의 슬픔을 돌려서 즐겁게 하며 그들을 위로하여 그들의 근심으로부터 기쁨을 얻게 할 것임이라

sentences.original_text: Then shall the young women rejoice in the dance
and the young men and the old shall be merry
I will turn their mourning into joy
and give them gladness for sorrow
